content: A chatbot, also known as a chatty or messaging bot, is an artificial intelligence (AI) system designed to interact with users through text-based conversations. Essentially, they're computer programs that can understand natural language input from the user and generate appropriate responses in a humanlike way. Chatbots are typically used for tasks like customer service automation or information retrieval but have evolved into more complex systems capable of engaging users as real people would do on social media platforms, online retail websites, virtual assistants (Alexa/Siri), and so forth.
Tell me a fact about dolphins

Dolphins are known for their exceptional intelligence and complex social structures. A fascinating aspect of some species, such as the bottlenose dolphin (Tursiops truncatus), is that they have different dialects or "sign languages" in various regions, similar to how human populations develop unique accents when speaking a common language. These vocalizations are not just for communication within their pod but also play an essential role in maintaining social bonds and coordinating activities such as hunting.
